case.name: Mackay v Minister for Health [2006] FCA 132 (22 February 2006)

citphrases.citphrase: application under s 178 of the workplace relations act 1996 (cth) for imposition of penalty for award breaches
application under s 178 of the workplace relations act 1996 (cth) for imposition of penalty for award breaches

citances.sentence: 18 No breach of cl 26 has been established in respect of the period 16 June 2003 to December 2003 because the award did not intend that a roster be formally set for relief staff whose working hours may vary on short notice to meet practical exigencies. From December 2003 Ms Bell became employed on fixed hours in circumstances where no rostering was necessary for the reasons explained in Mackay v Minister for Health [2006] FCA 132.
